0.content: The diagram shows a solid metal cylinder of diameter 14 cm and height 25 cm. A cuboid of metal with a square end of 6 cm wide and with 25 cm height is hollowed out (i.e. a hole in the shape of a square is formed) as shown. (Take Ï€=22/7)

2.content: (a) Calculate the volume of the cylinder.

3.content: (b) Calculate the volume of remaining piece of metal after removing the cuboid
